channel.title: [317] I really need some help! [317]
channel.description:
1. When i wear a bronze dagger and attack with it, the dagger vanishes, i attack with my hands, and the dagger comes back in my hand. If i'm right, it's because i have to add an animation to it. But how do i do that? And does anyone maybe have a list of the animations...?
2. When i change the item name in item.cfg, will it really change too? I mean, do i have to do it in item.cfg, or somewhere else?
3. How can i do that (in case 53), that when u use like... an egg, pot of flour or milk on a cake tin, it will check if you have the other items needed in your inventory, if you don't have it, it will send you a message, if you have it, the 4 items (egg, pot of flour, milk and cake tin) will go, and you get an uncooked cake.

item.title: [317] I really need some help! [317]
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

What do i have to search in class 8?

item.title: [317] I really need some help! [317]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“xweetok599, post:1, topic:338083”]1. When i wear a bronze dagger and attack with it, the dagger vanishes, i attack with my hands, and the dagger comes back in my hand. If i’m right, it’s because i have to add an animation to it. But how do i do that? And does anyone maybe have a list of the animations…?

  1. When i change the item name in item.cfg, will it really change too? I mean, do i have to do it in item.cfg, or somewhere else?

  2. How can i do that (in case 53), that when u use like… an egg, pot of flour or milk on a cake tin, it will check if you have the other items needed in your inventory, if you don’t have it, it will send you a message, if you have it, the 4 items (egg, pot of flour, milk and cake tin) will go, and you get an uncooked cake.[/quote]

  3. Depends on where your combat is handled. In client.java or in combat > npccombat/playercombat.java

  4. Class8 in your client.

if(!playerHasItemAmount(###, 1) && !playerHasItemAmount(###, 1) && !playerHasItemAmount(###, 1) { sendMessage("You need an egg, pot of flour, and a cake tin to make this!"); }

Read full topic
